Hello to Ishido Game !
 The rules of the game are the following:
 There is a 8x12 board. You have a deck of 72 tiles which have, 
 both color and shape. There are 6 colors you can choose from: 
 White, Blue, Orange, Green, Yellow and Red, and 6 shapes you can choose from: 
 @, !, +, ?, %, *. The deck is consisted of 2 of each combination of color and shape.
 You can place a tile anywhere on the board, except if you want to place a tile 
 adjacent to another tile which has a different color or shape. In other words, to score a point, 
 you have to place a tile next to another tile of similar color or shape. 
 The point of the game is to score as many points as you can.
